ple risk factors helps improve your outlook. The good news is that many lifestyle changes help control multiple risk factors. For example, physical activity can lower your blood pressure, help control your blood sugar level and your weight, and reduce stress.
                
It's also very important to follow your treatment plan for diabetes and see your doctor for ongoing care.
